title: riot nailed it when it comes to buying rp
body:
I went to buy Rp, the options are all numbers that end in .00  you can pay 5.00, 10.00 20.00 and when you pay, there is no tax added,  there's no 9.99 options

you get to pay exactly $10.00, nothing more, nothing less

it's like peace in the world.  Riot's payment team did good.
